feed.title: Miniscript Studio - a fulll IDE based on Rust Miniscript

entry.title: Miniscript Studio - a fulll IDE based on Rust Miniscript
entry.summary: This inquiry primarily revolves around the project's nature, specifically questioning its open-source status. The sender expresses appreciation for the project, acknowledging its usefulness and the positive impact it has had. Their interest in whether the project is available as open-source suggests a desire to possibly contribute to, learn from, or utilize the project's resources beyond its current application. This engagement reflects a broader trend where individuals seek to be part of collaborative efforts that foster innovation and share knowledge freely within the tech community.
